The following is a list of towns in Indiana as of January 1, 2104, with population estimates from 2000 through 2004. { U.S. Census Bureau. Table 4. Annual Estimates of the Population for Incorporated Places in Indiana, Listed Alphabetically: April 1, 2000 to July 1, 2004 (SUB-EST2004-04-18). Release Date: June 30, 2005. } The 2000 to 2004 listings are population estimates as of July 1 of the year. The final 2000 listing is of the 2000 United States Census.
